name: Zero Genesis Early Access Demo
description:
--- This is an Early Access Demo --- 

If download does not work please let me know in comment section below.

As well as if you have any questions.

The demo will take you to the first boss and you can freely explore the beginning of the game and get familiar with the combat system and mechanics. 

Story Synopsis :

Our world was once at the doorstep of destruction because of our ancestors. It was a weapon of mass destruction that they created that almost ushered the end of humanity. However they manage to prevent it by sealing away the weapon. What is this weapon we speak of? No one knows what it is as it been sealed away for 1000 of years and knowledge of it has been wiped clean or so they say.

==========

Characters : Pending Info

==========

Game Features :

- 7 Main Playable Characters

- Active Turn Base Battle System

- Magic Learn System

-  Some Original Created Music along with well crafted music composed by other creators.

-----NOTICE-----

-This game is crater to seasoned JRPG players and fans. Not for first time players of the RPG genre.
